Get file paths

{% raw %}

get_fpaths[source]

get_fpaths(LEX, CORPUS_DIR='data/', source='local', bucket_name='socemb')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fpaths = get_fpaths('Anglo-Saxon', source='local')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fpaths

['data/Anglo-Saxon/Anglo-Saxon_2006-02-04--2020-08-13.csv',
 'data/Anglo-Saxon/Anglo-Saxon_2019-12-31--2020-10-06.csv']
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert len(fpaths) == 2
{% endraw %}

read_comments[source]

read_comments(fpaths)

df = read_comments(fpaths)

Parse dates

parse_dates[source]

parse_dates(df)
